at.mukprojects.console

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.mukprojects.console.Console

  • public class Console
extends Object
    This class represents the console. It handles starting and stopping it as well as drawing it to the screen. The console can be started and stopped at any time. For drawing there are multiple different options to render the console.
    Author:
    Mathias Markl

      • Console

        public Console(processing.core.PApplet applet)
        Constructs a new Console object.

      • Console

        public Console(processing.core.PApplet applet,

        font - The font of the console.

    • Method Detail

      • setTimestamp

        public void setTimestamp(boolean timestamp)
        If timestamp is set to true, the console will add a timestamp to every log entry.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp flag.

      • setCutMove

        public void setCutMove(boolean cutMove)
        If this flag is set to true, the console will cut log entries which include the String "__MOVE__". This String gets printed everytime the the Processing window is moved.
        Parameters:
        cutMove - The flag.

      • setAutoPrint

        public void setAutoPrint(boolean autoPrint)
        If this flag is set to true, the Console will also be printed to the default system out.
        Parameters:
        autoPrint - The flag.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the console. The standard output and error stream will be redirected to the console.

      • checkDuplicateAppender

        public void checkDuplicateAppender()
        Checks if more than one ConsoleAppender is added to the Logger. If so, the default ConsoleAppender will be removed.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the console. The standard output and error stream will be set back to the original system output.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the stream to the original system output.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws the console to the screen.

      • draw

        public void draw(float x,
                 float y,
                 float width,
                 float height)
        Draws the console to the screen.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the console.
        y - The y position of the console.
        width - The width of the console.
        height - The height of the console.

                 float y,

        Draws the console to the screen.
        Parameters:

        y - The y position of the console.
        width - The width of the console.
        height - The height of the console.
        preferredTextSize - The preferred text size.

                 float y,

                 float padding)
        Draws the console to the screen.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the console.
        y - The y position of the console.
        width - The width of the console.
        height - The height of the console.
        preferredTextSize - The preferred text size.
        minTextSize - The minimum text size.
        lineSpace - The space between the lines.
        padding - The padding of the text.

      • draw

        public void draw(float x,
                 float y,
                 float width,
                 float height,
                 float preferredTextSize,
                 float minTextSize,
                 float lineSpace,
                 float padding,
                 int strokeColor,
                 int consoleColor,
                 int textColor)
        Draws the console to the screen.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the console.
        y - The y position of the console.
        width - The width of the console.
        height - The height of the console.
        preferredTextSize - The preferred text size.
        minTextSize - The minimum text size.
        lineSpace - The space between the lines.
        padding - The padding of the text.
        strokeColor - The color of the console stroke.
        consoleColor - The color of the console background.
        textColor - The text color.
